research_focus_description: Ramnath K. Chellappa focuses on electronic markets, pricing, digital goods piracy, and economics of information security and privacy. His research emphasizes analytical modeling, empirical modeling, and social network analysis, and includes significant contributions to understanding information privacy, music digitization, and software pricing. His work has been recognized with best paper awards in leading conferences.
